io::DataInputStream Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <DataInputStream.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::DataInputStream:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class for reading primitive types from the input stream in portable way.


Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

int io::DataInputStream::read (  void *  data,
int  size
)  [virtual]
 

Tries to read specified number of bytes from the source stream.

Doesn't block the caller if specified number of bytes isn't available.

Returns:
Number of bytes actually read.
Exceptions:
IOException 

Implements io::DataInput.

void io::DataInputStream::readUTF (  lang::Array< char > &  buf  ) 
 

Reads string encoded in UTF-8 from the stream.

Buffer size is adjusted accordingly.

Parameters:
buf [out] Receives 0-terminated UTF-8 string.
Exceptions:
EOFException 
IOException 

void io::DataInputStream::readUTF (  char *  buf,
int  bufsize
)  [virtual]
 

Reads string encoded in UTF-8 from the stream.

Parameters:
buf [out] Receives 0-terminated UTF-8 string.
bufsize Maximum size for the string. IOException is thrown if buffer too small.
Exceptions:
EOFException 
IOException
